name: A minor
details: The A Minor chord is composed of the notes A, C, and E.

name: A Major
details: This chord is made up of the notes A, C#, and E.

name: C Major

name: D Major

name: D minor

name: E Major
details: The notes in the Emaj chord are E, G#, and B.

name: E minor
details: The Em chord is composed of the notes E, G, and B.

name: F Major

name: G Major
